conclusion: Analyze forces to find tension and force ratio using angles and masses.
Guide rail at angle α, ball in groove, rope connects ball to pillow held by child, rope at angle β with vertical, masses m1 and m2.
Identify forces: tension in rope (T), force by pillow on child (F), weight components of child and pillow.
Resolve forces into components: Vertical - m2g and m1g balanced by T sin β; Horizontal - T cos β balances F cos α.
Use force balance to find ratio: T/F = (m2g/m1g) × (cos α/cos β).
Conclude ratio of tension to force is (m2/m1) × (cos α/cos β).
